code:
timeline
    title AI Evolution: From Rules to Reasoning (1950-2025)
    
    1950s-1980s : Rule-Based Era
                : ELIZA (1966)
                : SHRDLU (1970)
                : MYCIN (1972)
                : AI Winter begins
    
    1990s-2000s : Statistical Revolution
                : Deep Blue vs Kasparov (1997)
                : Support Vector Machines
                : Limited data & compute
    
    2010s       : Deep Learning Renaissance
                : AlexNet victory (2012)
                : GPU acceleration
                : ImageNet breakthrough
                : CNN dominance
    
    2017-2025   : Transformers & LLMs
                : Transformer paper (2017)
                : BERT (2018)
                : GPT series (2018-2024)
                : GPT-4.1 & o-series (2025)
                : Reasoning models
